name: Synder
headline: Easy accounting for e-commerce
description: Synder is an easy accounting platform focused on e-commerce.  It connects all sales platforms (like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon or Etsy) into one ecosystem, providing businesses with consolidated cash flow, automated accounting, and inventory management making Synder a single source of truth of the correct analytics, accounting and tax filing.

founders.name: Michael Astreiko, Founder
founders.description:
Starting in the eCommerce domain, during the last 7 years moved to the FinTech sphere and with the main focus on online sales, accounting & bookkeeping, and business automation delivering various solutions that are successfully serving thousands of businesses around the globe.

Loving husband and father of 3 children with a lot of attention paid to fathers’ duties and family activities. Love sports and tennis&squash in particular.

founders.name: Ilya Kisel, Founder
founders.description: Ilya has the background in the e-commerce sales (has been occupied in the e-commerce sphere for 7+ years). The main responsibility in Synder includes partnership development, marketing&sales strategy defining, and the connection of daily operations of the company into one aligned mechanism. If you have any ideas on potential collaboration, Ilya is the best person to drop a message (in LinkedIn or email)  and start a good, productive conversation.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Synder**

Synder is revolutionizing the way e-commerce businesses handle their accounting. Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S21, this San Francisco-based startup aims to simplify financial management for online sellers. 

**Mission:**  
The company's mission is straightforward: provide easy accounting solutions specifically tailored for e-commerce. Synder connects various sales platforms—like Shopify, Stripe, Amazon, and Etsy—into a cohesive ecosystem. This integration allows businesses to gain a clear and consolidated view of their cash flow, automate their accounting processes, and keep track of inventory effortlessly.

**Key Features:**  
1. **Consolidated Cash Flow:** Businesses can monitor their revenue and expenses from multiple sources in one place.
2. **Automated Accounting:** Streamlines mundane accounting tasks to reduce errors and save time.
3. **Inventory Management:** Helps e-commerce businesses keep track of their stock levels seamlessly.
4. **Analytics and Tax Filing:** Acts as a single source of truth, making it easier to analyze performance and manage taxes accurately.

**Team and Location:**  
While specific employee numbers are currently unspecified, Synder has a dedicated team located in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, a hub for innovation and technology.

**Website:**  
For more information, visit their official website: [Synder](https://synder.com).

To sum it up, Synder is carving out its niche in the financial tech space, providing essential tools for e-commerce businesses that often struggle with the complexities of accounting. It’s a promising solution for anyone looking to streamline their financial management while focusing on growing their business.
